amendment.description: To modify requirements applicable to the limitation on designation of critical habitat of conservation of protected species under the provision on military readiness and conservation of protected species.

vote.text: Amendment SA 722 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 190.

action.text: Amendment SA 722 proposed by Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S6810-6815; text: CR S6810) To modify requirements applicable to the limitation on designation of critical habitat of conservation of protected species under the provision on military readiness and conservation of protected species.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 722 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 190.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 722 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 190.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 722 proposed by Senator Lautenberg.
